sequenceDescription: Classic EDM drop with tension building and explosive release
musicalContext: Simulates a typical EDM buildup and drop pattern at 140 BPM. The tension rises through filtering and energy increase, then explodes with full bass and kick at the drop moment.
emotionalArc: Classic tension and release - building to explosive climax
visualJourney: Rhythmic pulsing intensifies, colors shift from blue to purple

keyMoments.description: Quiet moment - the form breathes gently, awaiting the next wave
Maximum intensity - the The heartbeat of the underground dancefloor explodes with energy
Rising energy - complexity increases as the beat drives forward

dropMoment.description: THE DROP - Maximum energy explosion, all parameters peak

bass.visualImpact: Controls twist factor - bass creates hypnotic spiral motion

kick.visualImpact: Drives pulse intensity - the visual kick drum

mid.visualImpact: Controls shape morphing between sphere and cube forms

high.visualImpact: Creates rim lighting and sharp edge definition

energy.visualImpact: Saturates colors from muted blues to vibrant purples

drop.visualImpact: Triggers color palette shift from blue to purple/gold
